column4: I am having a very simple problem that I can't seem to fix, so I stopped by looking for some help.
After following all the directions on the site concerning burning an Ubuntu image to disk from windows. The disk itself won't boot.

nolimitsaja, I download the image from the site. I use Infra Recorder (action -> burn image) to write the image to disk. Then I reboot, and select booting from CD/DVD, and it makes and attempt to read it, and then continues to windows.
also sometimes the cd/dvd reader is slower, so perhaps reboot to allow it time to read your cdrom
